page.title: 19Leisure by Jo
page.content: After school on Mondays my sisters Sarah and Emily and myself go to ballet classes in Marlborough. Here we do exercises and dances. On Tuesdays I have to go to be taught piano at Manton I find this rather boring. I come back at about 4.30 p.m so I can go outside to play. I sometimes go and weed my own garden or I go and watch the television but more often than not I go out on my bike. On Wednesday after school I go to Calne for swimming. I do survival badges as well as general learning but it takes a lot of practice. On Thursday I just play around the village after school as I do on Fridays. On Wednesday evening after swimming and tea I usually go to youth club where I can play darts or snooker. Theres a game on a table where you have to operate a game of football. There is also table tennis.
